existing_features.title: Tune the right-to-left track title marquee scrolling speed to be slightly slower than the current behavior by reducing the default `speedPxPerSecond` used by `TrackTitleMarquee` (currently `200`) so the scrolling feels less rushed across the app wherever the marquee appears.

new_feature_requests.summary: Tune/adjust the marquee speed further based on user feedback

projectName: Tune track title marquee scrolling speed further
